[[Undead Male Merchant]] - Purchase |atk-physical = 52 |res-physical = 88 |atk-magic = - |res-magic = 40 |atk-fire = - |res-fire = 30 |atk-lightning = - |res-lightning = 65 |critical = 100 |stability = 44 |str-bonus = D |str-req = 6 |durability = 160 |weight = 1.0 |weapon-type = Medium Shield |upgrade-type = Standard |atk-type = [[Strike (Damage Type)|Strike]] }} {{For|the [[Dark Souls III]] variant|East-West Shield (Dark Souls III)}} The '''East-West Shield''' is a [[Medium Shields|medium shield]] in ''[[Dark Souls]]''. {{Description |First paragraph = A wooden kite shaped shield. It is decorated with the ancient symbol of a double-headed eagle, painted yellow. | Second paragraph = Wooden shields are lighter than metal shields, but with lower physical damage reduction, and reduced shield stability. }} ==Availability== The East-West Shield is the starting shield for the [[Cleric]] class. It can also be purchased from the [[Undead Male Merchant]] in [[Undead Burg]] for 400 [[Soul (Dark Souls)|souls]]. ==Characteristics== The East-West Shield is ultimately not viable after the very beginning of the game, and is the worst medium shield for blocking physical attacks, with paltry stability and damage reduction. Even amongst wooden shields, the [[Wooden Shield]] is significantly better. The East-West Shield has medium deflection and fast [[Parry and Riposte|parry]] speed. When [[Weapon Modification|upgraded]] to [[Crystal (Upgrade Path)|Crystal]], the [[durability]] is 16. ===Resistance Defense=== Along with Physical and Elemental damage reduction, weapons also have hidden stats that reduce the amount of status build-up while blocking. {| class="article-table rounded" align="left" border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 250px; margin-left: 30px; text-align: center;" ! scope="col" style="text-align: center; border-radius:10px 0 0 0;" |Resistance ! scope="col" style="text-align: center; border-radius:0 10px 0 0;" |Reduction |- |[[Image:Aux Bleed.png|link=Bleed (Dark Souls){{!}}Bleed]] | style="text-align: center; " |80% |- |[[Image:Aux Poison.png|link=Poison (Dark Souls){{!}}Poison]] | style="text-align: center; " |80% |- |[[Image:Def res toxic.png|link=Toxic (Dark Souls){{!}}Toxic|22px]] | style="text-align: center; " |80% |- | style="border-bottom: 0px;" |[[Image:Def res cur.png|22px|link=Curse (Dark Souls)|Curse]] | style="border-bottom: 0px; border-radius:0 0 10px 0;" |80% |}{{clr}} {{clr}} ==Moveset== {{Moveset | 1hWeak = Diagonal swing to the left. | 1hStrong = Strong horizontal swings alternating from left to right. Some starting lag. | 2hWeak = Shield Bash.* | 2hStrong = Holds shield up and runs forward, then slams it down at the end. Additional inputs yield a horizontal swing.* | Jump = Slams shield into the ground. | Run = Holds shield up and runs forward, then swings open at the end.* | Roll = Downward swing. | Kick = Push away with the shield. | LhWeak = Block. | LhStrong = Parry. }} *While shield is up the player is actively blocking ==Upgrades== {{SuperWeaponBox |Standard= {{WeaponBox | Name = East-West Shield | Type = Standard | Cost = 200 | ShowStab = True | ForceFeed = True | 52 | -
